synopsis.text:
Club's first single, titled "Mirai Harmony," performed by the entire Nijigasaki High School Idol Club. The Blu-ray release merges both music videos and includes additional narrative elements, resulting in a single, engaging 8-minute and 30-second animated video.

Embark on a musical journey with the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club as they present their debut single! The animated music video features two captivating tracks: "Muteki-kyuu*Believer," performed by Kasumi Nakasu, and "Mirai Harmony," sung by the entire club. The Blu-ray release combines these videos and incorporates additional story bits, creating an 8-minute and 30-second animated experience that you won't want to miss!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
